help.text:
The input is a text file with comma separated values, a .csv file. The supported formats are " decimal '.' and separator ',' " or " decimal ',' and separator ';' ".
The lookup table index data must be in grid format. Data must be stored in three columns in the CSV file in the following format: "row_idx_value,column_idx_value,data_value". Row and column index value vectors can be floating point decimal values. The last line should consist of "nR = The number of index rows", "nC = The number of index columns" and 0 (a dummy value)
Example for 2x3 matrix where (nR=2, nC=3): r1, c1, v11 r1, c2, v12 r1, c3, v13 r2, c1, v21 r2, c2, v22 r2, c3, v23 nR, nC, 0
The index value vectors have to be strictly increasing, if this is not the case, they will be automatically sorted. Duplicate values in the index data vectors are not allowed. One blank (empty) line must be present at the end of the data file.
